categoryProjects.title: Private Chatbot: Encrypted Financial Complaint Chatbot
categoryProjects.excerpt: Private Chatbot is a user complaint chatbot application created with two technologies: Homomorphic Encryption and ChatGPT. Cryptolab, a startup that creates cryptographic solutions, provided us with SDKs to use Homomorphic encryption technology allowing us to encrypt chat messages.
